data.product: Custom Mens Toiletry Bag, Personalized Canvas Travel Bag, Travel Toiletry Bag, Men's Dopp Kit, Engraved Dopp Bag, Christmas Gifts for him
data.description:
This vintage styled canvas toiletry bag with a personalized leather piece design combines the charm of yesteryear with modern functionality. Made from a durable canvas material, this bag ensures durability and reliable performance. 

Size: 9.5in long, 3.5in wide, 5.3in high

The most striking feature is the compact leather piece design on the front, which can be customized for different gift-giving and usage occasions. Whether it's a birthday, anniversary or any special event such as Christmas, you can add a unique flavor to the gift by imprinting your initials, name or meaningful message on the leather flap.

data.description:
Our beautiful personalized garden stones are custom made to order. Pick any name for Grandma -- for example Grandma, Nana, Nanny, etc. and include up to 10 first names (message me if you need more names) and dates for the flowers - all other text included as shown. The flowers will be matched to the birth month. If no dates are provided we will match them with random flowers. If no name for Grandma is given, we use Grandma's Garden.

Garden Stone 8" size
Garden Stone 6" size

Please note your personalization in the message box during checkout.

Our garden stones ship quick from our studio in Southern California. We put lots love love and care into every item we create.

Approximately 8"  (18-20cm) and 6" (14-15cm)

Our stones are created from slate and by nature are weather proof. The coating that is applied to the stone is also weather proof and will not be affected by rain, cold or snow. Over time the sun could fade the writing and we suggest using an outdoor furniture spray or UV protectant just as you would for outdoor furnishings. The stones include a stand for indoor display if desired.

At this time we are not able to offer proofs before creating, please ensure all order information is correct before finalizing orders. If a mistake is noticed. Please notify us via convo within 12 hours.
